# CONSTANT_LENGTH raus dafür gap runter
begin remote

  name  AirSwimmer2013
  bits           8
  flags SPACE_ENC
  eps            30
  aeps          100

  one           300   720
  zero          300   220
  ptrail        300
  pre_data_bits 16
  pre_data      0xC9B1
  gap          25000
  toggle_bit_mask 0x0

      begin codes
          DIVE                     0x87
          CLIMB                    0x4B
          TAILLEFT                 0x2D
          TAILRIGHT                0x1E
      end codes

end remote
